titles.title: THRIVE Act
Terminating Heavy Regulations to Invigorate a Vibrant Economy Act
THRIVE Act
To amend title 5, United States Code, to exempt deregulatory rule from congressional review requirements, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Terminating Heavy Regulations to Invigorate a Vibrant Economy Act or the THRIVE Act
This bill exempts from congressional review specified deregulatory rules (e.g., final rules with total costs less than zero that reduce costs by repealing or revising an existing rule).
